review: Pretty cool little device. Turns your normal flat screen into a Smart TV, which is awesome because I don't have cable. I was originally going to get a Smart TV so I could watch Netflix and stuff on it, but they were considerable more expensive than the standard HDTVs in comparable size, picture quality, and brand. So I bought a standard HDTV, and this instead. The menu format is quite different then any Smart TV I've ever used, but functionally, it's more or less the same thing.The only downside is that you do have to have an Amazon account with your 1 click settings set up a certain way, and with a valid billing address in order to download (the free) apps that allow you to use Netflix and such. That's a little ridiculous to me for a free app, but it is what it is.
